reference.title: Resolve map references (mapref)
reference.shortdesc: The mapref module resolves references from one map to another.

section.p: Maps may reference other maps using markup similar to the following:<topicref href="other.ditamap" format="ditamap"/>
The DITA 1.2 standard added a new element that allows this sort of reference without setting the format attribute:<mapref href="other.ditamap"/>

In either case, the element that references the other map is replaced by the topic references from the other map. Relationship tables are pulled into the referencing map as a child of the root element (<map> or a specialization of <map>).
This step is implemented in XSLT.
